Class BossAbility

java.lang.Object
com.tloj.game.abilities.MobAbility
com.tloj.game.abilities.BossAbility
Direct Known Subclasses:
DodgeEvenRoll, HalveDamage, VampireDodge
public abstract class BossAbility extends MobAbility
Abstract class that represents an ability that a boss can use.
